clearQueue.label: Clear TTS Queue
clearQueue.tooltip: Clears the text to speech queue in case someone spammed your queue.

command.label: TTS command
command.tooltip: Use this command together with the message afterwards (e.g. !tts Hello World).

minPowerLevel.label: Min Power Level
minPowerLevel.tooltip: Minimum power level required to be able to trigger Text-To-Speech.

userPointsCost.label: Cost to use
userPointsCost.tooltip: How many points will be subtracted when a user uses the TTS command.

defaultVoice.label: Default Voice
defaultVoice.tooltip:
In case you only selected one language you can use your command with the sentence behind it (e.g. !tts Hello World).
If you select multiple languages you need to add the language key after the command (e.g. !ttsde Hallo Welt or !ttsen Hello World)

userCooldown.label: User Cooldown (seconds)
userCooldown.tooltip: How many seconds a user has to wait until he is allowed to use the TTS command again.

userMaxQueues.label: Max Queues per User
userMaxQueues.tooltip: How many TTS queues a user is allowed to have active.

globalCooldown.label: Global Cooldown (seconds)
globalCooldown.tooltip: How many seconds need to pass between each TTS call

globalMaxQueues.label: Max Queues Globally
globalMaxQueues.tooltip: How many total TTS queues are allowed to be active.

userMaxMessageLength.label: TTS Message Length
userMaxMessageLength.tooltip: How many characters are allowed per TTS message?

volume.label: Audio Volume
volume.tooltip: Volume of the announcer for the TTS message

helpCommand.label: Help Command
helpCommand.tooltip: Lists all the enabled languages in chat.

blackWordFilter.value: Trump, Nigger, Jew, Nazi, Nigga, Faggot
blackWordFilter.label: Black List
blackWordFilter.tooltip:
List of words you want to get filtered seperated through commas.
Additionally the message will be purged.

languagezh.label: (ZH) Chinese
languagezh.tooltip: If you want to use a chinese announcer write !ttszh <your message>

languagenl.label: (NL) Dutch
languagenl.tooltip: If you want to use a dutch announcer write !ttsnl <your message>

languagefr.label: (FR) French
languagefr.tooltip: If you want to use a french announcer write !ttsfr <your message>

languagede.label: (DE) German
languagede.tooltip: If you want to use a german announcer write !ttsde <your message>

languageit.label: (IT) Italian
languageit.tooltip: If you want to use a italian announcer write !ttsit <your message>

languageja.label: (JA) Japanese
languageja.tooltip: If you want to use a japanese announcer write !ttsja <your message>

languageko.label: (KO) Korean
languageko.tooltip: If you want to use a korean announcer write !ttsko <your message>

languagepl.label: (PL) Polish
languagepl.tooltip: If you want to use a polish announcer write !ttspl <your message>

languagept.label: (PT) Portuguese
languagept.tooltip: If you want to use a portuguese announcer write !ttspt <your message>

languageru.label: (RU) Russian
languageru.tooltip: If you want to use a russian announcer write !ttsru <your message>

languagetr.label: (TR) Turkish
languagetr.tooltip: If you want to use a turkish announcer write !ttstr <your message>

languagees.label: (ES) Spanish
languagees.tooltip: If you want to use a spanish announcer write !ttses <your message>

languagesv.label: (SV) Swedish
languagesv.tooltip: If you want to use a swedish announcer write !ttssv <your message>

languageen.label: (EN) UK English
languageen.tooltip: If you want to use a british announcer write !ttsen <your message>

languageus.label: (US) US English
languageus.tooltip: If you want to use a US announcer write !ttsus <your message>

responseMessageTooLong.value: @$user your message is longer than the character limit ($characterLimit).
responseMessageTooLong.label: Message Too Long
responseMessageTooLong.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user wrote too many characters.

responseUserSpamming.label: TTS used too often
responseUserSpamming.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user wrote too many messages within a certain time.

responseGlobalQueueActive.value: @$user global cooldown active, you have to wait $waitSeconds seconds.
responseGlobalQueueActive.label: Global Cooldown active
responseGlobalQueueActive.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user wrote during the global cooldown.

responseUserNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough Points
responseUserNotEnoughPoints.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user has not enough currency.

responseUserLanguageNotFound.value: @$user language hasn't been found! Use $helpCommand to get a list of available languages.
responseUserLanguageNotFound.label: Language not found
responseUserLanguageNotFound.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user tried to use tts with a not used language.

responseUserTooManyInQueue.value: @$user you have reached the limit of $maxQueue queue entries.
responseUserTooManyInQueue.label: Too many TTS in queue
responseUserTooManyInQueue.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user has reached the max amount of messages.

responseKeyMissing.value: Streamlabs TTS Queue: It looks like the $streamer hasn't set up the Unique Key value yet. TTS will not be useable.
responseKeyMissing.label: Unique Key Missing
responseKeyMissing.tooltip: Error message in chat when the streamer didn't enter the Unique Key in the scripts.

responseGloballyTooManyInQueue.value: @$user the total TTS queue of $maxGlobalQueue entries is full.
responseGloballyTooManyInQueue.label: Global queue full
responseGloballyTooManyInQueue.tooltip: Error message in chat when the user reached the global limit of messages.

btnOpenWebsiteNewKey.label: Open the link in my browser
btnOpenWebsiteNewKey.tooltip: Opens a tab in your default browser with the link for the BrowserSource.
btnOpenWebsiteNewKey.group: Get a link for your Browser Source

btnWhisperNewKey.label: Whisper me the link per Twitch
btnWhisperNewKey.tooltip:
Your bot will whisper you the link for the BrowserSource.
IMPORTANT: This will only work if you have a seperate twitch account for your bot! If you don't have seperate ones - use the button above!
btnWhisperNewKey.group: Get a link for your Browser Source
